skills.name: Fade Into Nothing

skills.desc:
Whenever this Champion is attacked, completely blocks 1 hit, decreasing the incoming damage to zero, then counterattacks with the default skill.

When attacked by a Boss, decreases the incoming damage by 50% instead before counterattacking.
